## logEvent() function

Sends analytics event with given `eventParams`<!-- -->. This method automatically associates this logged event with this Firebase web app instance on this device.

See [Track Screenviews](https://firebase.google.com/docs/analytics/screenviews)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function logEvent(analyticsInstance: Analytics, eventName: 'screen_view', eventParams?: {
    firebase_screen: EventParams['firebase_screen'];
    firebase_screen_class: EventParams['firebase_screen_class'];
    [key: string]: any;
}, options?: AnalyticsCallOptions): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  analyticsInstance | [Analytics](./analytics.analytics.md) |  |
|  eventName | 'screen\_view' |  |
|  eventParams | { firebase\_screen: [EventParams](./analytics.eventparams.md)<!-- -->\['firebase\_screen'\]; firebase\_screen\_class: [EventParams](./analytics.eventparams.md)<!-- -->\['firebase\_screen\_class'\]; \[key: string\]: any; } |  |
|  options | [AnalyticsCallOptions](./analytics.analyticscalloptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
